import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./qualification.css"; export default function Education ({keyValuePairsEdu}){ const [toggleState, setToggleState] = useState(1); const [dividerLine, setDividerLine] = useState(0); function toCreateDivider(){ setDividerLine(dividerLine+1); } return (

Qualification

My personel journey
setToggleState(1)}> Education
setToggleState(2)}> Experience
{keyValuePairsEdu.map(([key, value])=> (
{(dividerLine%2) ==1 ?
:''}

{key}

{value[0]}
{value[1]}
{value[2]}
{value[3]}
{(dividerLine%2) ==0 ?
:''}
{toCreateDivider}
))}
); }
